house_listing.house_description: Wow! Lots of square footage, great open floor plan, high ceilings. Wood deck, privacy fence, corner lot. Almost 'everything' is next to new in this immaculate move-in condition home. Search no further! Easy to show, but must call agent first!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style,Fenced, Foyer, Pantry, Skylights, Storage Space, Utility Room
